name: karma-css
description: The Official Sass Version of Karma-CSS: A Simple, Responsive Boilerplate for Mobile-Friendly Development.
author: Accent Design <npm@accentdesign.co.uk>

scripts.css-compile: sass --style expanded --source-map --embed-sources scss/karma.scss dist/karma.css && sass --style expanded --source-map --embed-sources scss/karma-components.scss dist/karma-components.css
scripts.css-minify: cleancss -O1 --format breakWith=lf --with-rebase --source-map --source-map-inline-sources --output dist/karma.min.css dist/karma.css && cleancss -O1 --format breakWith=lf --with-rebase --source-map --source-map-inline-sources --output dist/karma-components.min.css dist/karma-components.css
